posts.post_content:
Hey all, I'm closing in on a PSA graded set of 518 and am down to the following 32.  Am looking for cards graded PSA 2, 3, or 4 only (not interested in half grades due to OCD!).  Please let me know if you can help.

Mike Donlin, Seated
Bull Durham

Marty
